title: 802.1X Enterprise Authentication
description: WPA2/WPA3 Enterprise with 802.1X required for employee SSID
remediation_text: Migrate from PSK to 802.1X with RADIUS. Deploy EAP-TLS for strongest security.

title: RADIUS Certificate Validity
description: RADIUS server certificate expired or weak
remediation_text: Rotate certificates before expiry. Use 2048-bit RSA or ECDSA. Verify CN/SAN.

title: Duplicate SSID Detected
description: Multiple BSSIDs advertising same SSID - potential Evil Twin
remediation_text: Investigate on-site. Enable WIDS alerting. Consider automated deauth of rogue.

title: Unknown BSSID in Zone
description: AP not in inventory detected within coverage area
remediation_text: Physically locate AP. If unauthorized, disconnect and investigate.

title: Management VLAN Separation
description: AP management traffic should be isolated from user traffic
remediation_text: Place AP management interfaces on dedicated VLAN. ACL to allow only bastion hosts.

title: Central Log Forwarding
description: AP/Controller logs should forward to SIEM
remediation_text: Enable syslog over TLS to Elasticsearch/Splunk. Include 802.11 management events.

title: VLAN Segmentation
description: Guest, IoT, and Corporate should be on separate VLANs
remediation_text: Configure VLANs with inter-VLAN firewall rules. Micro-segment critical assets.

title: Firmware EOL/CVE Check
description: AP firmware may be end-of-life or have known CVEs
remediation_text: Check vendor support status. Plan hardware refresh if EOL. Patch known CVEs.

title: Default SNMP Community Strings
description: Default 'public'/'private' SNMP strings allow unauthorized access
remediation_text: Change or disable SNMP community strings. Use SNMPv3 with auth/encryption.

title: UPnP Enabled
description: UPnP can be exploited for port forwarding attacks

title: PCI-DSS / HIPAA Wireless Requirements
description: If handling PCI/PHI, verify WPA/802.1X, logging, retention
remediation_text: Ensure WPA2-Enterprise or WPA3, quarterly wireless scans, log retention per standard.
